title: Error Boundary Triggered Event Data
description: Data payload for the error.boundary_triggered event. Fired when a UI error boundary catches an error in a component tree.

componentName.description: The name of the component whose error boundary was triggered.

error.description: The error message caught by the boundary.

componentStack.description: The component stack trace showing the component hierarchy.

recovered.description: Whether the error boundary was able to recover and render a fallback.
